1309500.name: Road To Death
1309500.description: Road To Death is a first person shooter set in a dark demonic world. You have the choice to play a progressive Zombie mode, where you can earn points, barricade and unlock items and new levels. You can test your marksmanship in Training mode and bust out the big guns. Once you feel confident enough, press the button to call in the terrorists! If you get tired slaying zombies and terrorists, you can kick back and relax at the Safehouse and watch the news while listening to some tunes.
1309500.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
